name: @y2kfund/tasks-for-single-instruments
_devDependenciesComment: The devDependencies below use PRODUCTION versions from Git. These are used when npm install is run by cloudflare

scripts._devComment: Command '>npm run dev' for development with hot reload uses local package from ../app-core
scripts._buildComment: uses package from Git repository for app-core
scripts.build:lib: npm run deps:prod && vite build --mode lib
scripts._previewComment: Serves locally built files from dist/ folder. it doesn't build, just serves what's already in dist/
scripts._comment: deps:dev installs local package temporarily (--no-save), deps:prod ensures Git repo is used
